en.title: Testimonial - Quantum Pendant
en.content:
James Wong, Renowned Malaysian Actor And Producer.

 
JAMES WONG CREDENTIALS:

- Favorite Artiste Award (1995, 1996, 1997, 1998).
- Favorite Male Artiste Award (1996, 1997, 1998).
- Best Drama Award for Rites of Passage (1998).
- Host for Miss Astro Chinese International Pageant (1998).
- 21st Century Peace Idol Award (1999).
- Chief of Creative for NEC Hand Phone Ad in Beijing (2000).
- Best Television Actor Award (2005).
- Top 5 Most Popular Actor Award (2005).
- Malaysia Global Chinese Golden Arts Award (2005).
I lead a very hectic and stressful life. Due to the nature of my industry, I need to be physically fit and mentally attentive at all times. But my biological clock is also ticking, which causes my stamina and metabolism to somehow plummet.

However, in an eventful encounter with Fusion Excel, I experienced the extraordinary Quantum Pendant, which startled me as I cannot imagine how a humble and small pendant could do so much. From the demonstrations I undergo personally, I finally relent to the strength of FusionExcel’s Quantum Pendant.

I once sprained my back that at times bothers me especially after an intense work out. However, I was very amazed as after wearing FusionExcel’s Quantum Pendant, that aching pain totally stopped. Now, I can work out unreservedly and surprisingly hardly out of breath when I was playing futsal or golf.

I am also starting to drink only from my Quantum Flask as I notice my skin starting to glow. I am also feeling extremely energetic and vibrant.

I had never imagine such a wonderful encounter as I am skeptical at the beginning but after numerous experience, I am now very excited to share this magnificent products to everyone around me.
